page.title: 16LOUISE CONTINUES HER DAY
page.content: After play we have French when we learn numbers or names of animals.We return to class and do English for half an hour until lunchtime at 12.00. We line up on the playground,and then Mrs.Barker and Mrs.Elliot,our dinner ladies,walk us round to the dining hall.We wait outside until the dinner ladies have found us a seat.We sit down and have our dinner.Some people stay for a cooked meal,but others bring their own meal.I bring sandwiches.When I have finished I return my sandwich box to my class.I go to the field and play with my friend.At 13.05 a bell goes and we return to class.During the afternoon we have science when we learn about such things as friction and pulleys.We have play for 15 minutes and then do art for about 45 minutes.When the bell goes at 15.30 we return home.
